mapper.select: select qp.*, qq.*, qq.title as question_title, qc.class_name from quiz.q_paper qp left join quiz.q_paper_questions qpq on qp.paper_id = qpq.paper_id left join quiz.q_question qq on qpq.question_id = qq.question_id left join quiz.q_classes qc on qq.class_id = qc.class_id where qp.paper_id = #{paperId} and qp.state != -1 order by qpq.id

select qp.*, count(qa.responder_user_id) as answers_total, qq.*, qq.title as question_title, qc.class_name from quiz.q_paper qp left join quiz.q_answers qa on qp.paper_id = qa.paper_id left join quiz.q_paper_questions qpq on qp.paper_id = qpq.paper_id left join quiz.q_question qq on qpq.question_id = qq.question_id left join quiz.q_classes qc on qq.class_id = qc.class_id where qp.state != -1 and qp.creator_user_id = #{userId} group by qp.paper_id, qq.question_id, qc.class_id

select qp.*, count(qa.responder_user_id) as answers_total, qa2.answer_id, qa2.selects, qa2.score, qq.*, qq.title as question_title, qc.class_name from quiz.q_paper qp left join quiz.q_answers qa on qp.paper_id = qa.paper_id left join quiz.q_answers qa2 on qp.paper_id = qa2.paper_id and qa2.responder_user_id = #{responderUserId} left join quiz.q_paper_questions qpq on qpq.paper_id = qp.paper_id left join quiz.q_question qq on qpq.question_id = qq.question_id left join quiz.q_classes qc on qq.class_id = qc.class_id where qp.state != -1 and qp.creator_user_id = #{creatorUserId} group by qp.paper_id, qa2.answer_id, qq.question_id, qc.class_id

select qp.*, qa.answer_id, qa.selects, qa.score, qq.*, qq.title as question_title, qc.class_name from quiz.q_paper qp left join quiz.q_answers qa on qp.paper_id = qa.paper_id and qa.responder_user_id = #{responderUserId} left join quiz.q_paper_questions qpq on qp.paper_id = qpq.paper_id left join quiz.q_question qq on qpq.question_id = qq.question_id left join quiz.q_classes qc on qq.class_id = qc.class_id where qp.paper_id = #{paperId} group by qp.paper_id, qa.answer_id, qq.question_id
